column5: Quick little fishing trip, Went up to the Notty with the father in law and my son in the little 10 foot tinny. Had a few bites, saw a couple bows splash. Didn’t catch anything. But it was a great day spent on the river. Hopefully it will turn on soon with the rain coming
Many have come and gone way up. More to come I am sure.
I normally don’t fish that area until around now til it freezes.
Little guy looks like he was having a blast 👍🏻Thanks for the report!
He loves fishing! It’s great, it’s kinda odd he likes it though being he has ADHD. But he does pay super attention to stuff he enjoys.
Great one do most of you go south or more near Wassaga to fish? please advise Thanks
Can’t do much fishing south of 90, although there is a huge tree dam farther up north, it’s been there for almost a decade I think. Maybe 100 feet or more in length of brush and trees.
anything north of 90 is good  right?
Be weary of the zero possession limit if you're fishing above the Pine and downstream of the Boyne.    All steelhead must be released.
Yup! Thanks BillM It is all about the fun, not fishing for food
